hadiths.text: It was narrated from Muhammad bin Sad that his father said:"The Messenger of Allah said: "The month is like this and like this and like this,"' meaning twenty-nine. Yahya bin Saeed and others narrated it from Ismail, from Muhammad bin Sad, from the Prophet

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى إِسْمَاعِيلَ فِي خَبَرِ سَعْدِ بْنِ مَالِكٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: mentioning The Differences Reported From Ismail In The Narration Of Sad Bin Malik About that
